strategy.trend_analysis: Incorporates current meme culture (Surprised Pikachu, Ring Light), political commentary trends (Right Wing Explodes, Maybe Next Decade), and established pop culture references (Spider-Man, Marvel). Leverages both niche and broad hashtags for maximum discoverability and targeted reach on Instagram.
strategy.engagement_strategy: A mix of direct questions (#WhatDoYouThink), calls to action (#ShareIfYouAgree, #TagAFriend), and trend-based hashtags that invite participation and commentary (e.g., #RightWingExplodes, #HandsomePM) will drive conversation and interaction.

usage_tips: For Instagram, aim for a diverse mix of popular and niche hashtags. Don't be afraid to use all 30, but ensure relevance.
Consider placing a portion of your hashtags in the first comment to keep the caption clean, especially for longer posts.
Monitor the performance of each hashtag in your Instagram insights to refine your strategy over time. Adjust based on which tags are driving the most reach and impressions.
Tailor the hashtag mix slightly if cross-posting to other platforms, emphasizing trending and searchable tags where appropriate (e.g., #SpiderManMovie on Twitter or YouTube).

generation_metadata.topic: Marvel Comics cameo: SPIDER-MAN ARRIVAL! Lapid: 'Just happy to be HERE!' Web-swinging panels! Five-month SPEEDRUN: PM achievements BLUR by! ZOOM! UN speech panel: 'TWO STATES!' Right-wing heads EXPLODE! SCANNER-STYLE! TV host panels: Mirror admiration! 'HANDSOME PM!' Heart eyes everywhere! Campaign battle: DAVID vs GOLIATH #47! Slingshot ready! Election loss: SURPRISED PIKACHU FACE panel! 'Five minutes of fame!' Clock shows 5:00! Opposition return: 'Maybe next DECADE?' Shrug panel. Post-credit: Instagram THIRST TRAP poses!
